arts.ttl: Napoli Player Ratings vs Lazio: Olivera Switch-Off Topples Partenopei
arts.sum: Lazio pulled off a stunning 1-0 victory against title-chasing Napoli on Sunday night, knocking Antonio Conte's side down from the top of the Serie A standings. Marco Baroni's men built on a remarkable 3-1 win in midweek Coppa Italia action on a rainy night in Naples to help Atalanta ascend the throne. arts.ttl: Isaksen Stuns the Maradona Crowd as Lazio Complete the Double Over Napoli
arts.sum: Lazio have extended their brilliant run against Napoli, beating Antonio Conte’s men for the second time in 72 hours. Ideal Lineups While the two sides had fielded rotated lineups in Thursday’s Coppa Italia clash, the managers resorted to their best formations for Sunday’s big Serie A showdown.
